    • Method Detail

      • maxUtilAct

        public static ActionUtility maxUtilAct(State[][] states,
                                       ActionUtility[][] au,
                                       int i,
                                       int j)
        maxUtilAct Method Finds the ActionUtility with the highest Utility by using an ArrayList and sorting it using UtilityComparator. Calls the getUtilAct(states, au, i, j, act) method
        Parameters:
        states - the states of the StateGrid to be used
        au - the array of ActionUtility to be used
        i - the x coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        j - the y coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        Returns:
        ActionUtility the ActionUtility with the highest Utility

      • getUtilAct

        public static ActionUtility getUtilAct(State[][] states,
                                       ActionUtility[][] au,
                                       int i,
                                       int j,
                                       Action act)
        getUtilAct Method Finds the ActionUtility of the State using a specific action and the probability of taking the intended action. Calls upUtil, downUtil, leftUtil, rightUtil methods
        Parameters:
        states - the states of the StateGrid to be used
        au - the array of ActionUtility to be used
        i - the x coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        j - the y coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        act - the intended action to be taken
        Returns:
        ActionUtility the ActionUtility of the specific intended action

      • upUtil

        public static double upUtil(State[][] states,
                            ActionUtility[][] au,
                            int i,
                            int j)
        upUtil Method Calculates the Utility of taking the Up action
        Parameters:
        states - the states of the StateGrid to be used
        au - the array of ActionUtility to be used
        i - the x coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        j - the y coordinate starting from the top left corner of the grid
        Returns:
        double the utility of taking the Up action

      • Arr2DtoCSV

        public static void Arr2DtoCSV(double[][] arr,
                              java.lang.String fileName)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Arr2DtoCSV method Copies a 2D array of type double to a csv file in the same directory
        Parameters:
        arr - 2D array of objects to be copied into the csv
        fileName - String of the filename to be written into
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
